column1: Provide comprehensive project management, on-site supervision, and coordination of all trades throughout the duration of the project.
Perform a preconstruction walkthrough and verify all existing conditions prior to mobilization.
Coordinate site access, material deliveries, staging areas, temporary utilities, and construction security with the Owner and building management.
Maintain OSHA compliance and implement healthcare-appropriate infection control measures throughout the project.
Secure and coordinate all applicable permits, inspections, and final approvals.
Construct new partition walls as per wall type schedule using 20 GA metal studs with acoustic batt insulation.
Install gypsum board with Level 4 finish in all exposed areas; Level 1 finish above ceilings.
Install doors, frames, and hardware per door schedule, including reuse and refinishing of selected existing frames.
Provide firestopping at rated assemblies and sealant at joints between dissimilar materials.
Coordinate layout of partitions and components with reflected ceiling plans and MEP trades.
Provide blocking for all wall-mounted equipment and accessories.
Fabricate and install medical-grade cabinetry, base cabinets, wall cabinets, and countertops per plans and details.
Ensure all finishes meet ADA accessibility and healthcare regulatory standards.
Coordinate with MEP subcontractors for rough-ins and installation of plumbing fixtures (toilets, sinks, exam room basins).
Coordinate HVAC duct modifications, thermostat installation, and air distribution systems.
Coordinate new power distribution, lighting, and fire alarm devices per electrical plans.
Coordinate installation of data, technology, and access control systems.
Complete all punch list work to the satisfaction of the Owner and Architect.
Provide final cleaning and turnover of all areas in a ready-for-occupancy condition.
Coordinate and schedule final inspections and occupancy approvals with the local authority.
Provide a minimum one (1) year workmanship warranty for all labor and materials furnished and installed under this contract.
